MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  LL28 postcode area of Colwyn Bay, affecting properties in Rhos on Sea and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  3:35PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 5:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:27PM on 13th March 2021.
